      • createAlert

        public static javafx.scene.control.Alert createAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType theAlertType,
                                                     javafx.stage.Stage theOwner,
                                                     java.lang.String theTitle,
                                                     java.lang.String theHeader,
                                                     java.lang.String theContent)

        Creates and initializes an alert.

        This method just encapsulates the tiresome setting of the icon and resizing the alert to fit the text.

        Parameters:
        theAlertType - alert type
        theOwner - owning stage
        theTitle - title
        theHeader - header
        theContent - content
        Returns:
        created alert
        Since:
        0.10.0

      • createExpandableAlert

        public static javafx.scene.control.Alert createExpandableAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType theAlertType,
                                                               javafx.stage.Stage theOwner,
                                                               java.lang.String theTitle,
                                                               java.lang.String theHeader,
                                                               java.lang.String theContent,
                                                               java.lang.String theDetails,
                                                               java.lang.String theLongtext)

        Creates and initializes an alert.

        This method just encapsulates the tiresome setting of the icon and resizing the alert to fit the text.

        Parameters:
        theAlertType - alert type
        theOwner - owning stage
        theTitle - title
        theHeader - header
        theContent - content
        theDetails - detail message
        theLongtext - long text
        Returns:
        created alert
        Since:
        0.10.0
